website_summaries.verdict: Step in a teeter-totter motion to propel this scooter forward.
pros: Includes air suspension and a hand brake
Made to support teens or adults
Larger wheels help it to operate smoothly
cons: This scooter can be a little challenging to learn how to use

customer_reviews.title: So fun! My 12 YO son and 7YO twin daughters ...
customer_reviews.text: So fun! My 12 YO son and 7YO twin daughters all love it! The handle bars can be adjusted for their differing heights. We recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Crissy

customer_reviews.title: An alright ride
customer_reviews.text: Because I'm 5'3" its a little high off the ground but I got over that real quick. Its great as a kick off. The riding however is a challenge all on its own. The buttons tend to be stuck and hard to push. When going up the hill there would be a straining sound on the metal rail. I would giv it 4 because of its difficulty with the buttons
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: awesome, both my girls love it, 7 & 9 yrs!!
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Novelty
customer_reviews.text: Will hardly take any up hill climb. Slow going, inefficient drive. Where does all the power go?
customer_reviews.author: John A Nees

customer_reviews.title: NEEDS Tweeking.
customer_reviews.text: The handlebars wiggle and cannot be tighten. The footbase needs to be longer.
customer_reviews.author: J E

customer_reviews.title: Once assembled my son found it difficult to keep this ...
customer_reviews.text: Once assembled my son found it difficult to keep this scooter moving. To the point that he doesn’t want to ride it often
customer_reviews.author: Britni Baber

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, fast way to go to my job
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, fast way to go to my job, and also having fun during weekends. So happy with my Scooter (:
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HE loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Just right for my 7-year old grandson. HE loved it!
customer_reviews.author: nellie

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for everyone !
customer_reviews.text: My son (and everyone else :-) Loved this scooter... Really easy to ride and a great fun for the whole family! I was very skeptical on buying it - after all it's not that cheap - but decided to try and loved it! really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo Caldas

customer_reviews.title: Neat scooter
customer_reviews.text: Quality, well built and interesting drive mechanism on this scooter. It works well, though takes a little getting used to. I like how adjustable it is and that it can be a regular kick type scooter as well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael DiCicco

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The boys love them and when they can the girls get on them. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: lynda craven

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old nephew loved it for his birthday!
customer_reviews.author: Tara M.

customer_reviews.title: Smart boy! It looks cool enough where the neighbor ...
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old son bought this with his own lawn mowing money from the summer. He pumps it to make it go. He had a motorized scooter last year -- the battery died, so he thought he'd get this instead of buying new batteries all the time. Smart boy! It looks cool enough where the neighbor kids want to try it. It's a little tall looking, but, he has no issue with it. It has a kick stand, and he has no balance issues with it. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Space Scooter - a success
customer_reviews.text: My grandson was sooo excited to receive this scooter. Couldn't get him off it for the longest time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best probably for smaller kids
customer_reviews.text: These were inadequate for my teenage daughters; they were too heavy. Best probably for smaller kids. Don't even think about it if you are over 125lbs. We returned them before we broke them.
customer_reviews.author: David L. Little

customer_reviews.title: SpaceScooter VS Electric Razor.... SpaceScooter!
customer_reviews.text: Very cool design, and a lot more fun then an electric Razor scooter. We have the Junior size also, my 40" tall 4yr old rides the Jr and my 48" tall 6yr old rides this regular size comfortably. The handlebars have a lot of adjustment for kids to adults. Also, being able to have this model change from the pumping action to just a flat board scooter is nice. **note the Jr size does not do this. Very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: N Rez

customer_reviews.title: I like it very much,very fun aerobic exercise...!
customer_reviews.text: I have just received (only one day using it) and I like very much...it has very good finish and construction materials seems very good. I only have a doubt: when I acelerate very fast in scooter mode a clicking sound is produced, I already write to the manufaccturer support. In conclusion I recomend it !!!!! its a very good aerobic activity for adults!
customer_reviews.author: darwin Infante

customer_reviews.title: Space Scooter is a Hit!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product that kids got to enjoy. I assembled the Space Scooter in less than 5 minutes. It was ready to use right after. I had several kids try it out to see if different kids with different skills would be able to use it. They all loved it. Kids ranging from seven to twelve years old was able to ride this with ease. They learned and adapted to the motion needed to let it move forward without any problems. They prefer it over the standard scooter. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Who

customer_reviews.title: REQUIRES GOOD BALANCE
customer_reviews.text: The scooter came folded up and we needed to read the instruction book on how to assemble it for use. The manual is in several languages but very small font; luckily, the assembly instructions were diagrams and easy to follow. It folds up again for storage. My older son quickly grasped the see-saw action required to make this scooter go and you can get it up to a nice speed. A good sense of balance is needed. I would strongly suggest wearing a helmet and pads for smaller kids.
customer_reviews.author: Curious One

customer_reviews.title: Scooter on Steroids
customer_reviews.text: Not that kids need it any easier, this scooter makes it simple to zoom past friends (and parents) with an ingenious propulsion system. It seems pretty sturdy despite its ability to fold up and the break function makes it a complete package. And I'm not an overprotective parent, but I'm pretty sure I want my kids using a helmet on this.
customer_reviews.author: JSB Morse

customer_reviews.title: Such Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome. My youngest son has ditched his motorized scooter and scooting all over on this thing. I see him and his friends taking turns going around the block over and over laughing and chasing each other. No significant assembly required. Smooth operation that seems like great exercise. I can't personally vouch for it as the 200 pound weight limit means that my middle aged body is tipping the limit a bit. It is almost motivation to lose weight so I can have fun as well!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Dykhuis

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware! This is NOT the original Space Scooter ...
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware! This is NOT the original Space Scooter that is getting rave reviews, but a fake copy of inferior quality. This product is not covered by our warranty or customer service. Space Scooter help desk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Are the wheels can be change on this one if it is worn out already
customer_reviews.author: Binny J.

product_meta.title: SpaceScooter Push Board Teeter Totter Kids Scooter with Brake, Air Suspension & Compact Fold - Black
product_meta.description:
The scooter sensation from Europe. Just pump-and-go. The innovative Space Scooter can be ridden like a traditional kick-scooter or propelled forward by moving the board up and down in a teeter-totter like motion.



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
feature_bullets: SPACE SCOOTER – Discover a new way to move with this fun and unique scooter experience.
HOW IT WORKS – Propelled forward by pushing the board with both feet in a teeter totter motion. Just Pump and Go! (can also be converted to a traditional kick scooter)
COMPACT – More compact than a bike and faster than a conventional push scooter.
SAFETY – Features a powerful rear wheel handbrake to slow down & air suspension for a smooth ride with a durable steel / aluminium design.
AGE SUITABILITY – Suitable for kids aged 8+ and great for adults too. Fun for all the family.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars241 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
